title: Team Serenity looking for a Top, Support for I2P
body: hey guys, Team Serenity are looking for a top and support to fill the holes in our roster, if you are interested post you op.gg and main champs below

replies.body:
Hey there im a sup main with a huge large pool can play most supports, currently plat 3 but steadily climbing 

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Therthar
Main champs are morgana, thresh, braum,leoana, rakan

Hey Seniaz!

I'm a sup main and have a top friend willing to try play for you guys.

Large champ pools and tournament experience! 

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Hohnkatron
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=im+an+addict

Profiles above and are free most days after 5pm.

Discord with good mics and good net.

Let us know!

Cheers
